members.member: returns a set of projects that a combine contains and a set of projects that are referenced from combine projects but not part of the combine
This class allows for instantiation of template texts that contain %%VARNAME%% sequences. The class contains a hashtable of replacements that are used to replace the variables

member.name: P:MonoDevelop.Autotools.MakefileData.ParallelProcesses
member.summary: The number of parallel build processes to use
